marklogic.body: Just keep drinking the kool-aid and suckling at Apple's teet. iSlaves have been brainwashed so much that even when Apple has problems with their products (Too hot, 2 ounces heavier, yellow screens, piss poor Battery life, eats too much 4G too quickly, shatters when you drop it, You're holding it wrong, I can keep going) they don't realize they received a bum product. They are too busy staring at their shining object saying Look How much prettier mine is than yours! They want us to be jealous because we can't afford one? BS...the rest of us simply choose a superior product because we don't feel the need to conform, we actually have a choice as to what we get to purchase rather than having the almighty Apple choose for us. How does their catch phrase go? Think different.....And Be Exactly Like Everyone Else!!!
